short_summary: Renovation for French River specifically for Weather Stations
description: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time.
full_summary:
=================


### French River Dam Site Preparation for Weather Stations
=====================================================

### Contract Information
------------------------

* **Solicitation Number:** WS3735681112
* **Reference Number:** WS3735681112-DOC3735786237
* **Modification Number:** 1
* **Publication Date:** 2022-11-17
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-12-05 @ 14:00:00 EST

### Contract Description
-------------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is requesting proposals to prepare the site for the installation of weather stations at the French River Dam. The selected contractor will be required to carry out site preparation work as per the provided specifications.

### Contract Category and Location
----------------------------------

* **Contract Category:** CNST (Construction)
* **Location:** Ontario (excluding NCR)

### Contract Method and Evaluation Criteria
------------------------------------------

* **Contract Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Evaluation Criteria:** Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements
-------------------

* **Applicable Trade Agreements:*
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contact Information
-------------------------

* **Contracting Authority:*
	+ Zobia Essa, PSPC/SPAC
	+ Email: [zobia.essa@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:zobia.essa@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
	+ Ariba Discovery Posting ID: 14668472


### Contractor Requirements and Referral
-----------------------------------------

Refer to the tender package for full project requirements.

> :**Note:** All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted before 14:00 EST on December 5, 2022. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive. The electronic tender submission will be conducted via Ariba Discovery.

Please direct any questions or concerns to Zobia Essa at [zobia.essa@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:zobia.essa@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca). The PSPC/SPAC team will commit to responding to all questions within 24 hours of receipt.

You are expected to communicate with the successful bidder based on the contract's finalization. The procurement will proceed as outlined in the responder contract package according to responses received. We anticipate the project timeline length would typically be allowed time for fulfillment.

The submission contains anticipated timeline and identifiable timelines specifically titled above for clarity reference.

From [FALSE Contracting Entity Information\_N
